company_name: Saudi Allied For Chocolate And Gifts Co
policy_holder: Saudi Allied For Chocolate And Gifts Co

coverage_details.vaccination: Covered up to annual limit as per MOH schedule
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame limit SR 400.00, as part of overall optical limit
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Kidney transplant covered SR 250,000.00. Other organ transplants not listed.
coverage_details.dental_general: Scaling is covered twice per year
coverage_details.newborn_disability_screening: SR 100,000.00, includes early screening and costs for newborns with disabilities
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,000.00 (age limit 0-999); frames included in limit
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-authorization required for VIP members for outpatient and inpatient, except for outpatient services with specific limits (dental, hearing aids, optical, maternity, dialysis); medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit (SR 1,000,000.00).
coverage_details.special_instructions: Scaling is covered twice per year. Road Traffic Accident (RTA) is covered for all members. Option to add commercial and visit visa members for all schemes.
